solution_line_template: If the lorry is loaded with {num_bags} bags of apples, each weighing {weight_per_bag} pounds, it will have an additional weight of {num_bags}*{weight_per_bag}=<<{num_bags}*{weight_per_bag}={additional_weight}>>{additional_weight}

The total weight of the lorry after being loaded with the bags of apples will be {empty_lorry_weight}+{additional_weight}=<<{empty_lorry_weight}+{additional_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} pounds
